A: Animals
Animals in the school Compound
1. A frog is found in the school _ (a) house (b) compound (c) sky)
2. A snail has a _ (a) shell (b) scale (c) feather)
3. A lizard has _ (a) webbed feet (b) scales (c) wings)
4. A cock has _ (a) scales (b) feathers (c) shells)
5. Which animal listed has a tail? (a) Snail (b) Lizard (c) Butterfly)
6. A toad has webbed hind _ (a) tails (b) feathers (c) limbs)
7. A wall gecko is an animal found in the school _ (a) compound (b) pond (c) stable)
8. Animals are living _ (a) things (b) objects (c) places)
9. Some animals are _ to us (a) dangerous (b) safe (c) helpful)
Important features of some Animals
10. Mammals are animals that give _ (a) birth (b) eggs (c) milk)
11. Which of these is a mammal? (a) Snake (b) Goat (c) Hen)
12. Dogs are _ (a) reptiles (b) mammals (c) birds)
13. A snake is a _ (a) mammal (b) reptile (c) bird)
14. Which of these is a reptile? (a) Rabbit (b) Crocodile (c) Pigeon)
15. Hen, pigeon, and duck are _ (a) insects (b) amphibians (c) birds)
16. An ant is an _ (a) amphibian (b) insect (c) reptile)
17. Which of these is an insect? (a) Toad (b) Butterfly (c) Cow)
18. Toad and frog are _ (a) mammals (b) insects (c) amphibians)
19. The behavior of animals is what they _ (a) eat (b) do (c) see)
20. A dog eats meat and _ (a) seeds (b) bones (c) grass)
21. Dogs give birth to young ones called _ (a) lambs (b) puppies (c) chicks)
22. A dog _ (a) crows (b) barks (c) bleats)
23. Chicken feeds on seeds and _ (a) meat (b) grains (c) leaves)
24. A hen _ (a) barks (b) bleats (c) crows)
25. Sheep eat leaves and _ (a) seeds (b) bones (c) grasses)
26. Young ones of sheep are called _ (a) puppies (b) lambs (c) chicks)
27. Sheep _ (a) barks (b) bleats (c) crows)
28. Cockroaches live in dark corners of _ (a) farms (b) homes (c) ponds)
29. Cockroaches _ (a) fly (b) crawl (c) swim)
30. Cockroaches lay _ (a) eggs (b) live young (c) puppies)
B: 1. Cows, goats, and sheep are kept in a _________
2. Cocks, hens, and chickens are kept in a _________
3. Fish are kept in an aquarium or a _________
